entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump has such narcissistic need to be right that even when a nurse says to his face in the Oval Office that they need PPE he can’t help but tell her she’s wrong and that they don’t. He could have just said I hear you and I will do what I can to help. But no. #COVID19
